entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
